data.text: Yahweh, when you are angry with me,
Now it is as though you have shot your arrows at me and wounded me;
Because you have been angry with me,
All my sins are like a flood that covers my head;
Because I have done foolish things,
Sometimes I am bent over, and sometimes I lie prostrate;
My body is burning with fever,
I am completely exhausted, and I have no strength.
Yahweh, you know that I desire to be healed;
My heat is pounding heavily, and all my strength is gone.
My friends and neighbors stay away from me because of my sores;
And those who want to kill me set traps to catch me;
Now I act like I’m deaf, and do not listen to what they say.
I act like a man who does not answer when people talk to him,
But Yahweh, I trust in you.
I said to you, “Do not cause me to die, with the result that my enemies will rejoice!
I say that because I am about to fall down,
I confess the wrong things that I have done;
My enemies are healthy and strong;
Those who do evil things to me in return for my doing good things to them
Yahweh, do not abandon me!
Lord, you are the one who saves/rescues me;
